EmailTemplate.description: Auto generated response sent to new leads with Augusta contact information
EmailTemplate.name: FLS Lead Submittal Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Sears Commercial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for expressing your interest in Sears Commercial. At Sears Commercial, our goal is to enhance your business, and make your life easier by providing high quality products, programs, and services.
To determine how best we can help meet your business objectives, your local Sears Commercial Account Manager will contact you within 2 business days to follow-up on the inquiry you submitted today. If you need our help immediately, please contact our Support Center at 1-800-359-2000.
Thanks again for reaching out to Sears Commercial; we look forward to working with you!
